attributes.action: change the laws for emergency drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to start a petition to change the law so that emergency drivers dont get arrested for breaking the speed limit on an emergency call, the reason for this petition is the fast a emergency sevrice can get there the more chance lives can be saved, as it is vital for emergency sevrices can get there as quick and safe as possible.
